PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛瘟（rinderpest）在全世界范围内曾经造成过大量牛畜死亡，病牛出现口腔溃疡就是牛瘟的特征之一。牛瘟是一种能够给牛带来灾难 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German, from Rinder 'cattle' + Pest 'plague'

means.word_mean: 1. an acute infectious viral disease of cattle (usually fatal); characterized by fever and diarrhea and inflammation of mucous membranes
